response.original_title: Narita: le printemps de la grande offensive
response.overview: The film was made at a turning point in the struggle in Sanrizuka, documenting the actions against the first flights in Narita. The film chronicles the Sanrizuka struggle and the spring events that led to the occupation of the airportâ€™s control tower by one of the factions in the opposition struggle.
response.title: The Spring of the Great Offensive
